description: ADVT3508 provides students with an in-depth and critical review of contemporary advertising research and issues. A broad overview of influential advertising theories, research and practice underpins this analysis. The course aims to equip students with the knowledge and skills needed to undertake a comprehensive review of contemporary issues that pushes the boundaries of our knowledge of the field.
prerequisites: ADVT2506 or 2509 or 2510 or 2511 or MKTG2506 or 3502
